title: Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor
description: When working in the java editor, I observed that the process of reverting a file is significantly slower than closing and reopening the file. Here are the steps to reproduce the issue:
OB:
1. Answer "no" to the "do you want to save changes" dialog.
2. Double click on the file in the navigator to reopen it.
3. Repeat steps 1 and 2.
4. Select "Revert" from the pop-up menu in the editor.
EB: This behaviour seems odd because the process of reverting the file contents should not take longer than simply closing and reopening the file.
SR: Investigate the code responsible for the "Revert" functionality in the java editor to identify and resolve the performance issue.
